title.rendered: Toys and clothes drive and packing event

content.rendered: The toys and clothes drive and packing event was organized by boy scouts with support of United Help Ukraine. The group of boys was led by Artur, who was born in Berdyansk. He and his sister Victoria were adopted from Ukraine by a wonderful American family. The boys also raised $500 and covered the shipping of the parcels to Ukraine. UHU Volunteers Marina Baydyuk​, Oksana Osipova​, Rodion Iwanczuk​, Tamara Rudolph​ helped to pack and coordinated the shipment. Boxes are on their way to Ukraine to arrive in time for Ukrainian Christmas.
